name: @sfdx-falcon/types
description: Common collection of useful Salesforce-related types. Used by modules in the SFDX-Falcon Library.
author: Vivek M. Chawla (https://twitter.com/VivekMChawla)

scripts.build: rm -rf lib && rm -rf tsconfig.build.tsbuildinfo && tsc -b tsconfig.build.json
scripts.prepack: rm -rf lib && rm -rf tsconfig.build.tsbuildinfo && tsc -b tsconfig.build.json
scripts.test: echo "Error: run tests from root" && exit 1
